    Function reference

    All functions

    example_data
    Pollen data from four European sequences the Neotoma database (Goring et al., 2015)
    fc_calculate_DC()
    Calculate the dissimilarity coeficient
    fc_CharSNI()
    Calculate signal-to-noise index (SNI) for a charcoal record
    fc_check_data()
    Check the data
    fc_detect_peak_points()
    Detect significant peak points
    fc_estimate_RoC()
    RRatepol: Estimate rate of change
    fc_extract_data()
    Extract and check the data
    fc_make_bins()
    Create template for RoC estimations
    fc_plot_RoC_sequence()
    Function to plot the Rate-of-Change sequence
    fc_prepare_data()
    Prepare data for single RoC estimation
    fc_reduce()
    Reduce datasets
    fc_reduce_simple()
    Reduce datasets in merged format
    fc_run_iteration()
    Run a single interation of RoC estimation
    fc_smooth_community_data()
    Smooth the community data
    fc_standardise_community_data()
    Standardise the community data
    fc_subset_samples()
    Subsetting levels in each Working units (WU)
    fc_transfer_into_proportions()
    Transform community data into proportions
    util_check_class()
    Assert the class of object
    util_check_col_names()
    Check the presence of variables in data.frame
    util_check_if_integer()
    Assert the class of object
    util_check_vector_values()
    Check the presence of variables in vector
    util_flatten_by_one()
    Flatten the list by one levles
    util_make_trend()
    Predict data for certain trend
    util_output_comment()
    Output message in console
    util_output_heading()
    Output boxed message in console
    util_output_warning()
    Output warning in console
    util_paste_as_vector()
    Paste any list of values as a vector
    util_subset_community()
    Subset data to only contain community (taxa)

    Developed by Ondrej Mottl.
